pullrequest.title: More flexible NI DAQmx wait monitor functionality.

content.raw:
Done. Rather than just document it, the issue is now enforced by code that checks start\_order and stop\_order at compile time.

And I was bitten by not having the PulseBlaster detecting end-of-experiment without a wait monitor because I forgot that code was here…

merging.
